H0.text: A quadruped is an animal with how many feet. 2

H1.text: A quadruped is an animal with how many feet. 6

H2.text: A quadruped is an animal with how many feet. 8

H3.text: A quadruped is an animal with how many feet. 4

A4.text: Quadrupedalism is a form of locomotion in which animals have four legs that are used to bear weight and move around.

A5.text: quadruped (from Latin quattuor for 'four', and pes, pedis for 'foot')
